e880660a204b6fd0e5a0799393a4d36359765a54.commitMessage: HDFS-13399. [SBN read] Make Client field AlignmentContext non-static. Contributed by Plamen Jeliazkov.

f85cc14eb49a46e81d2edcdc1ffe4d0852f193a5.commitMessage: HDFS-7073. Allow falling back to a non-SASL connection on DataTransferProtocol in several edge cases. Contributed by Chris Nauroth.

HDFS-3504. Support configurable retry policy in DFSClient for RPC connections and RPC calls, and add MultipleLinearRandomRetry, a new retry policy.
